detail_desc: Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an open chest pocket, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides. Loose fit.
Blouse in crisp cotton poplin. Round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Unlined.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Wide waist belt in imitation suede with elastication at one end and adjustable tabs with metal buckles at the other. One small compartment with a flap and press-stud and one zipped compartment with a decorative tab. Imitation leather lining for added stability. Width 8 cm.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Suede belt that winds around the waist and ties at the front. Width 8 cm.
Vest top in soft jersey. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton. Jersey top with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder, an open chest pocket and contrasting colour neckline. Trousers in woven fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, leg pocket with a decorative button, and elasticated hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft, patterned cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sandals in canvas with a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and imitation cork wedge heels. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Coat in a cotton weave with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, seam at the waist and flare to the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the top.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, pleat at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with decorative trims and an opening and ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads and rhinestones. Three hoop earrings and five ear cuffs.
Leather gloves with decorative stitching on the uppers. Soft, knitted lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Ribbed, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist. Wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in airy, slub-weave cotton with contrasting colour embroidery around the neckline and on the sleeves. V-shaped opening at the front with twisted, tasselled ties. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and medium coverage at the back.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Frill trims down the sides of bib section, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Satin fancy dress cape to fit a small dog. Lightly padded collar, ties at the front and a hook and loop fastener underneath. Length excluding collar 33 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

Padded parka with a pile-lined hood with a tab and press-stud at the top. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets and flap patch pockets with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated, partially concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small, gathered collar and V-shaped opening at the top. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a narrow detachable belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with wide elastication at the back of the waist, a wide sewn-on tie belt at the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Thin metal chain necklace with a flat, round pendant. The necklace is plated with 22 carat gold. Adjustable length 39-45 cm.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slightly longer jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with asymmetric cut-outs at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.
Shimmering metallic triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Long T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and cut-out section at the top, both front and back, with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flared, buttoned cuffs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Baseball jacket in a felted wool blend with appliqués, a striped stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Viscose jersey top with a deep neckline at the front and short cap sleeves.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Dungaree dress in cotton corduroy with a chest pocket, fake front pockets and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Seam at the waist and an A-line skirt with a zip in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy denim with worn details, a regular waist and zip fly.
Trousers in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a high, elasticated waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.
Longer top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative zips at the front and slim legs with seams.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy modal blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.

Fine-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline in a relaxed fit. Low dropped shoulders with shiny metal press-studs, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Shimmering, holographic section at the heels, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Grandad collar, buttons down the front and a lace-trimmed yoke front and back. Long, wide sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with a scalloped edge at the top and two handles. Unlined. Size 14x28x38 cm.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and wide ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
